statements.statement: select * from TT_FILE_DINHKEM order by FILE_ID

select * from TT_FILE_DINHKEM
FILE_ID IN ($LIST_FILE_ID$)
TT_FILE_DINHKEM.REF_TABLE = '$REF_TABLE$'
TT_FILE_DINHKEM.REF_ID = '$REF_ID$'
TT_FILE_DINHKEM.ORIGINAL_NAME = '$ORIGINAL_NAME$'
TT_FILE_DINHKEM.UPLOAD_NAME = '$UPLOAD_NAME$'
TT_FILE_DINHKEM.UPLOAD_FOLDER = '$UPLOAD_FOLDER$'
TT_FILE_DINHKEM.TYPE = '$TYPE$'
TT_FILE_DINHKEM.SIZE = '$SIZE$'
TT_FILE_DINHKEM.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
TT_FILE_DINHKEM.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_FILE_DINHKEM.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
order by FILE_ID
select * from TT_FILE_DINHKEM where TT_FILE_DINHKEM.FILE_ID = '$value$' order by FILE_ID
select * from TT_FILE_DINHKEM where TT_FILE_DINHKEM.FILE_ID = '$FILE_ID$' order by FILE_ID
statements.insert:
select TT_FILE_DINHKEM_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_FILE_DINHKEM ( FILE_ID , REF_TABLE , REF_ID , ORIGINAL_NAME , UPLOAD_NAME , UPLOAD_FOLDER , TYPE , SIZE , BENHVIEN_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID ) values ( #ID# , #REF_TABLE# , #REF_ID# , #ORIGINAL_NAME# , #UPLOAD_NAME# , #UPLOAD_FOLDER# , #TYPE# , #SIZE# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# )
statements.update: update TT_FILE_DINHKEM set REF_ID = #REF_ID# where FILE_ID IN ($LIST_FILE_ID$)
statements.statement:
delete from TT_FILE_DINHKEM
FILE_ID = $FILE_ID$
FILE_ID IN ($LIST_FILE_ID$)
REF_TABLE = '$REF_TABLE$'
REF_ID = '$REF_ID$'

select clskq.CLSKETQUA_ID, NVL(clskq.BENHAN_ID, pt.BENHAN_ID) as BENHAN_ID, pt.PHAUTHUAT_ID, ba.SOBENHAN, NVL(tn.TIEPNHAN_ID, pt.TIEPNHAN_ID) as TIEPNHAN_ID from TT_CLSKETQUA clskq left join TT_TIEPNHAN tn on clskq.TIEPNHAN_ID = tn.TIEPNHAN_ID full join TT_PHAUTHUAT pt on pt.TIEPNHAN_ID = tn.TIEPNHAN_ID left join TT_NOITRU_BENHAN ba on (clskq.BENHAN_ID = ba.BENHAN_ID) or (pt.BENHAN_ID = ba.BENHAN_ID) where tn.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
TRUNC(clskq.NGAYTAO) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)

select * from TT_FILE_DINHKEM where BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
(REF_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$' and REF_TABLE = 'TT_PHAUTHUAT')
(REF_ID = '$CLSKETQUA_ID$' and REF_TABLE = 'TT_CLSKETQUA')
TRUNC(NGAYTAO) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)

select lt.LOAIHSBA_ID, ba.SOBENHAN, f.* from TT_FILE_DINHKEM f left join TT_BENHAN_MUONTRA mt on f.REF_ID = mt.SOTAILIEU left join TT_BENHAN_LUUTRU lt on lt.HOSO_ID = mt.HOSO_ID left join TT_NOITRU_BENHAN ba on ba.BENHAN_ID = lt.BENHAN_ID where f.REF_TABLE = 'TT_BENHAN_MUONTRA' and f.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and ba.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
TRUNC(f.NGAYTAO) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)
